content: Bar Rouge Singapore来自上海无可争议的标志性夜生活品牌——Bar Rouge，在新加坡斯坦福德瑞士酒店首次国际亮相。 Bar Rouge Singapore 位于繁华的城市上方 71 层，可一览无余地欣赏滨海湾区的美景，提供旨在唤起人们视觉、听觉和听觉感官的私密俱乐部体验。
contentEn: Shanghai’s indisputably iconic nightlife for the destination glitterati – Bar Rouge, makes its inaugural global debut at Swissotel The Stamford. Perched 71 floors above the buzzing city with an unobstructed view of Marina Bay area, Bar Rouge Singapore offers an intimate clubbing experience aimed at evoking one’s visual, audio and aural senses.
remarks:
